name: Sidebar
description: Sidebar is a panel component displayed as an overlay at the edges of the screen.

visible.label: visible
visible.title: Specifies the visibility of the dialog.

position.label: position
position.title: Specifies the position of the sidebar, valid values are "left", "right", "top", "bottom" and "full".

base-z-index.label: baseZIndex
base-z-index.title: Base zIndex value to use in layering.

dismissable.label: dismissable
dismissable.title: Whether clicking outside closes the panel.

show-close-icon.label: showCloseIcon
show-close-icon.title: Whether to display a close icon inside the panel.

modal.label: modal
modal.title: Whether to a modal layer behind the sidebar.

aria-close-label.label: ariaCloseLabel
aria-close-label.title: Aria label of the close icon.

block-scroll.label: blockScroll
block-scroll.title: Whether background scroll should be blocked when sidebar is visible.

close-icon.label: closeIcon
close-icon.title: Icon to display in the sidebar close button.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

slots.name: header
slots.title: Custom content for the component header.

events.name: hide
events.title: Callback to invoke when sidebar gets hidden.

events.name: show
events.title: Callback to invoke when sidebar gets shown.
